page.title: 13ANIMALS AROUND TILMANSTONE
page.content: At Harvest time animals can be seen quite clearly in fields and hedgerows. These include the{Field, Harvest}and {Dormouse}and{Shrews,}storing ears of corn to keep them through the winter. You may see a{Stoat}or{Weasel; slow_ {worm}or{Grass snake; Frog, Newt}or{ {Toad. Rats}and{foxes,}both vermin, and {Hedgehogs,}forage for food near habit_ ation.{Foxes}will soon provide sport for the Hunt. Mounds of earth show where the{moles have burrowed.{Rabbits}and{Hares, along with{Grey Squirrels,}are in hed_ gerows seeking nuts and berries. There are many domestic animals in the village;{cats, dogs, horses, {goats, chickens, geese}and a{donkey. On the farms there are{cows, calves and the{bull; sheep,}some of which will produce{lambs}twice during the year.
